name: B.F. Sword
description: +15 Attack damage

name: Recurve Bow
description: +15% Attack speed

name: Needlessly Large Rod
description: +20% Spell power

name: Tear of the Goddess
description: +15 Mana

name: Chain Vest
description: +25 Armor

name: Negatron Cloak
description: +25 Magic resist

name: Giant's Belt
description: +200 Health

name: Spatula
description: It must do something...

name: Sparring Gloves
description: +10% Crit and +10% Dodge chance

name: Deathblade
description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder +25 Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 1.0).

name: Giant Slayer
description: The holder's spells and basic attacks do 20% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1750 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 80%.

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: The holder's spells heal them for 45% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 400 damage.

name: Spear of Shojin
description: After first casting their spell, the holder's basic attacks restore 18% of their maximum mana on-hit.

name: Guardian Angel
description: Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

name: Bloodthirster
description: Basic attacks heal the holder for 45% of the damage dealt.

name: Zeke's Herald
description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Blade of the Ruined King
description: The wearer gains the Blademaster trait.

name: Infinity Edge
description: The holder gains 20% bonus critical strike damage, and their critical strike chance becomes 100%.

name: Rapid Firecannon
description: The holder gains 200% Attack Range, and their Basic Attacks can't miss.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description: Basic Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

name: Statikk Shiv
description: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 85 magic damage to 3.0/4.0/5 ★ enemies, and 85 true damage if they are shielded or crowd-controlled.

name: Titan's Resolve
description: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 50 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
description: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1500.0/2250.0/3000 ★ Health arises to continue the fight.

name: Infiltrator's Talons
description: The wearer gains the Infiltrator trait.

name: Last Whisper
description: When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 75% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: Grants +50% Spell Power Amplification. (All sources of Spell Power are 50% more effective)

name: Luden's Echo
description: When the wearer casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 200 magic damage.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 250.0/300.0/375 ★ damage for 8 seconds.

name: Ionic Spark
description: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 40% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

name: Morellonomicon
description: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Battlecast Plating
description: The wearer gains the Battlecast trait.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: The holder's spells can cause critical hits, and the holder gains +30% bonus critical strike damage.

name: Blue Buff
description: After casting their spell, the wearer's Mana is set to 20.0.

name: Frozen Heart
description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 50%. Each Frozen Heart a champion carries beyond the first increases the radius of this effect.

name: Chalice of Power
description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 30 Spell Power for 20 seconds.

name: Redemption
description: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

name: Star Guardian's Charm
description: The wearer gains the Star Guardian trait.

name: Hand Of Justice
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic attacks and spells deal +50% Damage or Basic attacks and spells heal for 50% of damage dealt.

name: Bramble Vest
description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100.0/140.0/200 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

name: Sword Breaker
description: The holder's basic attacks have a 33% chance to disarm the target for 3 seconds, preventing that enemy from making basic attacks.

name: Red Buff
description: The holder's Basic Attacks burn the target on-hit, dealing 10% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 4 seconds, and reducing healing by 50%, for that duration.

name: Rebel Medal
description: The wearer gains the Rebel trait.

name: Shroud of Stillness
description: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 40% until they cast.

name: Dragon's Claw
description: Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%.

name: Zephyr
description: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

name: Celestial Orb
description: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

name: Quicksilver
description: The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first 10 seconds of combat.

name: Warmog's Armor
description: Grants 1000 bonus Health. (including components)

name: Protector's Chestguard
description: The wearer gains the Protector trait.

name: Trap Claw
description: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for 4 seconds.

name: Force of Nature
description: Wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.

name: Dark Star's Heart
description: The wearer gains the Dark Star trait.

name: Thief's Gloves
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.
